participant_1.background:
I'm proud of the beautiful things I create with my hands.
I like to read diabetes blogs to learn about new ways to control my condition.
i work at a power plant.
i only surf when the tide is low.
i am insecure.

participant_2.background:
I go for a long run to relieve stress and clear my head.
i love cold weather.
i am a karate black belt.
I am so proud of myself for overcoming my fear of singing in front of people.
my twin brother and i share an apartment.

content.text: Hey, what's up?
Nothing much! Just got back from a run.
Nice! How long do you usually run?
I usually run for about an hour, but today I only ran for 30 minutes because it was so cold outside.
Oh, it's cold here too! I'm so glad I'm inside right now.
Me too! I'm actually a karate black belt, so I'm used to the cold weather.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to learn karate, but I'm too scared.
You should definitely give it a try! It's a lot of fun, and it's a great way to stay in shape.
I might have to! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! What do you do for a living?
I work at a power plant. It's not the most exciting job, but it pays the bills.
That's cool! I've never been to a power plant before.
They're actually pretty interesting! You should come visit mine sometime.
I might just take you up on that! Thanks for the offer.
No problem! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go surfing, sing, and read.
Oh, I love to read too! What are you reading right now?
I'm reading a book about the history of karate.
That sounds interesting! I've never read a book about karate before.
It's really good! It's taught me a lot about the history of the martial art.
I might have to check it out sometime.
You should! It's a great read.
Thanks for the recommendation
